snippet: STOBER--Gerald, M.D. The Greenberg and Menin families mourn the passing of Dr. Gerald Stober, the beloved husband, father and grandfather with whom we have had the privilege of celebrating more than three decades of holidays and family milestones. His loving presence and quick wit will be dearly missed. 1/3
lead_paragraph: STOBER--Gerald, M.D. The Greenberg and Menin families mourn the passing of Dr. Gerald Stober, the beloved husband, father and grandfather with whom we have had the privilege of celebrating more than three decades of holidays and family milestones. His loving presence and quick wit will be dearly missed. 1/3
